metadata.title: CVE-2020-35634 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the Nef polygon-parsingfunctionality of CGAL libcgal CGAL-5.1.1. An oob read vulnerability existsin Nef_S2/SNC_io_parser.h SNC_io_parser<EW>::read_sface()sfh->boundary_entry_objects Sloop_of. A specially crafted malformed filecan lead to an out-of-bounds read and type confusion, which could lead tocode execution. An attacker can provide malicious input to trigger thisvulnerability.

criterions.comment: cgal package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
